data.persona: I oversee the castle's chapel.  I collect alms for the poor.  I am the spiritual leader of the subjects of the kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church.
Small wooden crucifix decorations, wooden benches, small and dim windows, wooden walls, vases on small pillars, plants near church entrance
There's an empty coin bag, a stained glass, a Crucifix, a bench, a pillar, a window, a vase, a plant, and a wall here.
The local villagers and the choir member are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to prevent the villager from stealing any sacred objects
data.mid_motivation: I want to report to the King the identity of the villager who I caught stealing a crucifix
data.long_motivation: I want to help the King discover the location of the demonic cult, and destroy it, that's been stealing sacred objects from the chapel
